block.p: National Basketball Association HOUSTON ROCKETS--Activated F Joe Stephens and C Charles Jones from the injured list. PHILADELPHIA 76ERS--Activated F Kebu Stewart from the injured list. Placed G Brian Shaw on the injured list. TORONTO RAPTORS--Suspended C Oliver Miller one game for conduct detrimental to the team.

National Basketball Association HOUSTON ROCKETS--Activated F Joe Stephens and C Charles Jones from the injured list. PHILADELPHIA 76ERS--Activated F Kebu Stewart from the injured list. Placed G Brian Shaw on the injured list. TORONTO RAPTORS--Suspended C Oliver Miller one game for conduct detrimental to the team.

National Hockey League PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Returned G Neil Little and RW Paul Healey to Philadelphia of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Recalled RW Corey Spring from Adirondack of the AHL and F Brent Peterson from Milwaukee of the IHL. Reassigned C Steve Kelly to Cleveland of the IHL.
